amendment.description: Amendment changes the deadline by which voluntary separation incentive payments authorized by the bill must be taken from Feb. 1, 1997 to Mar. 31, 1997.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend the termination date of the employee buyout program fromFebruary 1, 1997 to March 31, 1997. The amendment would also allow employees eligible for retirement to participate in the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
